_A_LINK_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: Provides a connection to an internal or external source that the user can access by clicking or keyboard tapping.
_A_LINK_GROUP_CLASS_DESCRIPTION_: CSS classes enable different visual representations of the component.
_A_LINK_GROUP_DISABLED_DESCRIPTION_: When a disabled state is applied to ALink, the user is not allowed to interact with the component.
_A_LINK_GROUP_GROUP_DESCRIPTION_: Series of ALink components can be wrapped in a group using CSS.
_A_LINK_GROUP_GROUP_HORIZONTAL_VERTICAL_: Series of ALink components can be wrapped in a group vertically and horizontally using CSS.
_A_LINK_GROUP_GROUP_SIZES_DESCRIPTION_: CSS sizing can be applied to each group in place of applying sizing class to each ALink separately.
_A_LINK_GROUP_GROUP_VERTICAL_DESCRIPTION: Series of ALink components can be wrapped in a group vertically using CSS.
_A_LINK_GROUP_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: The anchor text can be specified in HTML format. The content will be sanitized.
_A_LINK_GROUP_ICONS_DESCRIPTION_: A custom icon can be provided in place of or next to the ALink text.
_A_LINK_GROUP_LOADING_DESCRIPTION_: A spinner cann be placed next to the ALink text to indicate a loading state.
_A_LINK_GROUP_OUTLINE_DESCRIPTION_: In addition to modifier CSS classes, outline classes can be used to remove the colorful background.
_A_LINK_GROUP_SAFE_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: The anchor text can be specified in HTML format using the safe-html parameter. This content is considered safe and will not be sanitized.
_A_LINK_GROUP_SIZES_DESCRIPTION_: Additional sizes are also available using CSS.
_A_LINK_GROUP_TEXT_AFTER_BEFORE_DESCRIPT: A custom character or text can be added before of after the ALink text.
_A_LINK_GROUP_TEXT_OBJECT_DESCRIPTION_: Separate anchor text can be specified for different screen sizes.
